Articles.Content:
I'm sure it's just that I'm not properly searching or it's something I missed within Stock KSP, but is there a way to see which missions I've assigned Kerbals to in the past?  I'm trying to keep some organization with them and plan who goes on what missions in my History of Spaceflight playthrough somewhat, but I'm not really wanting to start another spreadsheet just to track it if there's something that lets me see it already.

Thanks!
Maybe check out the Final Frontier mod?  It's not exactly what you're looking for, but it's the only thing I know of that is in-game.
Thanks!  I'll try that out.  It also led me to Ship Manifest and RosterManager, which I'm going to look at as well.
I'm not familiar with those.  I'll have to take a look at them myself.

On 5/1/2022 at 9:15 PM, razark said:

Maybe check out the Final Frontier mod?  It's not exactly what you're looking for, but it's the only thing I know of that is in-game.

At the very least, FF adds a huge amount of depth to the game.   Adds a bit of character to each kerbal.
The details of each mission a Kerbal goes on are recorded in the save files, though it only records changes in situation e.g. atmospheric flight, orbit, landing etc. for each body visited.
